column5: and clothing are astounding. The layers of fabric and interwoven history exude Excellence in artistry and pride of Black people.  And a Bonus for the Win - our hometown heroes the Obamas are on display. Kehinde Wiley and Amy Sherald are masterful capturing our forever first couple.
